roof beam/beam (structure)/bridge

flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Liangping county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan

sentences.english: The typical regional cultural circumstances and the rich soil in Liangping foster the development and flourish of Liangping New Year pictures.
sentences.chinese: 梁平的地域文化环境造就了梁平年画的发展和兴旺。
